ygData.subject: Re: Stuck at 1st lvl. . .
ygData.msgSnippet: Personally?  Probably never.  I have personally lead the slaughter of the Deathfist Orcs and cleaned out all Commonlands camps MULTIPLE times, I d even go far
ygData.messageBody:
Personally? Probably never. I have personally lead the slaughter of
the Deathfist Orcs and cleaned out all Commonlands camps MULTIPLE times,
I'd even go far as to say I've killed over a thousand orcs in an attempt to
get goody goody with Freeport. Hasn't happened yet. I would just suck up
and deal with it. I know I have. As a Gnome Necromancer you can still get
into places Dark Elves can't, but I don't see the factions as too much of a
difference because Dark elf Necromancers are treated fairly by all three
evil cities which is a large area to be liked in, wherea Gnome Necros are
sort of disliked everywhere but not totally hated. Take your pick.

Malark on Karana



-----Original Message-----
From: Mata [mailto:mata_eq@...]
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 7:51 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Stuck at 1st lvl. . .


No one ever answered that one guys question about if you kill enough ORCS in
GF or CB does it help your faction w/ High Elves AND Wood Elves???

How many Orcs (roughly) do I need to kill w/ my Gnome Necro (level 1 hehe
newbie) before High Elves or Wood Elves will not KOS????

Also what can I hunt in Steamfont that will not hurt my faction w/ Gnomes??
or anyone else for that matter. . . I don't know what to kill help stuck
at 1st lvl!!!!
